rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: Professor Kim is very smart and knowledgeable about advertising. You could tell that he cared and tried to make the class interesting. However, he goes way too fast through powerpoint slides - it is almost impossible to take notes even on a computer. But you can look them up later. Overall an okay guy.
